Thank you for using Provigos. To start things going, we suggest you go to the SETTINGS tab and choose which data sources (or as we like to call them, integrations) you want us to track. You can always opt-in or out anytime you want from a specific data source. After opting-in, you can choose which data you would like to track from the specific data source. Some items can be updated from inside Provigos by clicking on the item\'s data card in the DASHBOARD. You can also check weekly charts and more info by going to the CHARTBOARD tab.
Nothing to see here for now.
Choose integrations in the SETTINGS tab so we can get started.
Give your custom item a label
In what units is it measured?
What will it be shown as?
Disclaimer: Custom data works only for tracking data on a daily basis.
